resources.string: Rate of increase in surface pressure

string-array.name: formula_titles
string-array.item: 8. Плотность раствора с учётом запаса безопасности при СПО

10. Приближённое значение давления на насосе при прокачке раствора новой плотности
12. Максимально допустимое устьевое давление в КП (МДУДКП)
16. BARYTE REQUIRED TO INCREASE DRILLING MUD DENSITY
20. PRESSURE DROP PER FOOT TRIPPING DRY PIPE
21. PRESSURE DROP PER FOOT TRIPPING WET PIPE
22. LEVEL DROP PULLING REMAINING COLLARS OUT OF HOLE DRY
23. LEVEL DROP PULLING REMAINING COLLARS OUT OF HOLE WET
24. LENGTH OF TUBULARS TO PULL DRY BEFORE OVERBALANCE IS LOST
25. LENGTH OF TUBULARS TO PULL WET BEFORE OVERBALANCE IS LOST

28. PIT GAIN DUE TO SLUG U-TUBING
30. HYDROSTATIC PRESSURE LOSS IF CASING FLOAT FAILS

string-array.name: formula_expressions
string-array.item: Гидростатическое давление в бурильной колонне (psi) + ДБТЗС (psi)
Подача насоса (bbl/stroke) x Скорость работы насоса (SPM)
[Потери давления в КП (psi) ÷ ГСВ (ft) ÷ 0.052] + Плотность бурового раствора (ppg)
Старое значение давления (psi) x [Новая скорость насоса (SPM) ÷ Старая скорость насоса (SPM)]2
Старое значение давления (psi) x Новая Плотность бурового раствора (ppg) ÷ Старая Плотность бурового раствора (ppg)
[Устьевое давление при ИПП (psi) ÷ Глубина башмака по вертикали (ft) ÷ 0.052] + Плотность жидкости при ИПП (ppg)
[Макс. доп. плотность бур. р-ра (ppg) – – Плотность применямого р-ра (ppg)] x 0.052 x глубина башмака по вертикали (ft)
[Плотность раствора глушения (ppg) ÷ Старая плотность бурового раствора (ppg)] x Давление прокачки (psi)
[Kill Mud Density (ppg) − Original Mud Density (ppg)] x 1500 ÷ [35.8 − Kill Mud Density (ppg)]
Rate of Increase in Surface Pressure (psi/hr) ÷ Drilling Mud Density (ppg) ÷ 0.052

P1 x V1 = P2 x V2

P2 = P1 x V1 ÷ V2

V2 = P1 x V1 ÷ P2
[{Precharge Pressure (psi) ÷ Minimum Pressure (psi)} - {Precharge Pressure (psi) ÷ Maximum Pressure (psi)}] × Bottle Size (gallons)
Mud Density (ppg) × 0.052 × Metal Displacement (bbl/ft) ÷ [Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft) − Metal Displacement (bbl/ft)]
Mud Density (ppg) × 0.052 × Closed End Displacement (bbl/ft) ÷ [Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft) − Closed End Displacement (bbl/ft)]
Length of Collars (ft) × Metal Displacement (bbl/ft) ÷ Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft)
Length of Collars (ft) × Closed End Displacement (bbl/ft) ÷ Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft)
[Hydrostatic Pressure (psi) - Formation Pressure (psi)] × [Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft) − Metal Displacement (bbl/ft)] ÷ [Mud Gradient (psi/ft) × Metal Displacement (bbl/ft)]
[Hydrostatic Pressure (psi) - Formation Pressure (psi)] × [Riser or Casing Capacity (bbl/ft)− Closed End Displacement (bbl/ft)] ÷ [Mud Gradient (psi/ft) × Closed End Displacement (bbl/ft)]
Increase in Surface Pressure (psi) × Influx Volume (bbl) ÷ [Formation Pressure (psi) − Increase in Surface Pressure (psi)]
Length of Dry Pipe (ft ) × Pipe Capacity (bbl/ft) × Drilling Mud Density (ppg) ÷ [Slug Density (ppg) − Drilling Mud Density (ppg)]
Slug Volume (bbl) × [Slug Density (ppg) ÷ Drilling Mud Density (ppg) - 1]
[Air Gap (ft)+ Water Depth (ft)] × Mud Density (ppg)− [Water Depth (ft) × Sea Water Density (ppg)] ÷ [TVD (ft)− Air Gap (ft)− Water Depth (ft)]
Mud Density (ppg) × 0.052 × Casing Capacity (bbl/ft) × Unfilled Casing Height (ft) ÷ [Casing Capacity (bbl/ft) + Annular Capacity (bbl/ft)]

string-array.name: formula_expressions_metric_00981
string-array.item: Hydrostatic Pressure in Drill String (bar) + SIDPP (bar)
Old Pump Pressure (bar) x [New Pump Rate (SPM) ÷ Old Pump Rate (SPM)]2
Old Pump Pressure (bar) x New Mud Density (kg/L) ÷ Old Mud Density (kg/L)
[Surface LOT pressure (bar) ÷ Shoe TVD (m) ÷ 0.0981] + LOT Mud Density (kg/L)
[Maximum Allowable Mud Density (kg/L) – Current Mud Density (kg/L)] x 0.0981 x Shoe TVD (m)
[Kill Mud Density (kg/L) ÷ Original Mud Density (kg/L)] x Kill Rate Circulating Pressure (bar)
[Kill Mud Density (kg/L) − Original Mud Density (kg/L)] x 4.2 ÷ [4.2 − Kill Mud Density (kg/L)]
Rate of Increase in Surface Pressure (bar/hr) ÷ Drilling Mud Density (kg/L) ÷ 0.0981

P1 x V1 = P2 x V2

P2 = P1 x V1 ÷ V2

V2 = P1 x V1 ÷ P2
[{Precharge Pressure (bar) ÷ Minimum Pressure (bar)} - {Precharge Pressure (bar) ÷ Maximum Pressure (bar)}] × Bottle Size (L)
Mud Density (kg/L) × 0.0981 × Metal Displacement (L/m) ÷ [Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m) − Metal Displacement (L/m)]
Mud Density (kg/L) × 0.0981 × Closed End Displacement (L/m) ÷ [Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m) − Closed End Displacement (L/m)]
Length of Collars (m) × Metal Displacement (L/m) ÷ Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m)
Length of Collars (m) × Closed End Displacement (L/m) ÷ Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m)
[Hydrostatic Pressure (bar) - Formation Pressure (bar)] × [Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m) − Metal Displacement (L/m)] ÷ [Mud Gradient (bar/m) × Metal Displacement (L/m)]
[Hydrostatic Pressure (bar) - Formation Pressure (bar)] × [Riser or Casing Capacity (L/m)− Closed End Displacement (L/m)] ÷ [Mud Gradient (bar/m) × Closed End Displacement (L/m)]
Increase in Surface Pressure (bar) × Influx Volume (L) ÷ [Formation Pressure (bar) − Increase in Surface Pressure (bar)]
Length of Dry Pipe (m) × Pipe Capacity (L/m) × Drilling Mud Density (kg/L) ÷ [Slug Density (kg/L) − Drilling Mud Density (kg/L)]
Slug Volume (L) × [Slug Density (kg/L) ÷ Drilling Mud Density (kg/L) - 1]
[Air Gap (m)+ Water Depth (m)] × Mud Density (kg/L)− [Water Depth (m) × Sea Water Density (kg/L)] ÷ [TVD (m)− Air Gap (m)− Water Depth (m)]
Mud Density (kg/L) × 0.0981 × Casing Capacity (L/m) × Unfilled Casing Height (m) ÷ [Casing Capacity (L/m) + Annular Capacity (L/m)]
